metadata.title: Gerber Baby Boys Infant Toddler 4 Pack Potty Training Pants Underwear
features: 100% cotton rib; Interlining: 100% cotton/poly; Binding: 100% cotton rib
Includes four pairs of training pants
Features gentle elastic waistband for easy on / off & comfort. Perfect for small hands!
Reusable & easy-to-clean. Perfect for transitional stages of potty training.
Designed with cute prints & soft fabric to get your toddler excited about their "big kid undies"
description: Gerber training pants are ideal for toddlers who want to feel like they're wearing 'big boy' pants while potty training and used when accidents are less frequent. Made of 100% cotton panels with an absorbent interlining. Covered elastic waistband for increased comfort and ease of pulling up and down durable, washable and reusable. Machine wash and tumble dry. Gerber Childrenswear LLC is a leading marketer of infant and toddler apparel and related products in the marketplace - offering all of the everyday, core layette apparel including Onesies Brand one piece underwear, sleepwear and accessories that mom needs for babyâ€™s first years. We are the original maker and owner of the Onesies Brand trademark* which has been a staple product in babies wardrobes throughout the U.S. for over 30 years.
